title: Domains & DNS
description: Manage your domains, DNS zones, redirections and DNSSEC security.

empty.title: No domain or DNS zone
empty.description: You don't have any domain or DNS zone yet.
empty.selectDescription: Choose a domain or zone from the list to view its details.

status.lockedDesc: Transfer of this domain is protected.
status.unlockedDesc: This domain can be transferred to another registrar.

generalInfo.title: General information
generalInfo.tipsDesc: Enable transfer lock to protect your domain against unauthorized transfers.

zone.title: DNS Zone
zone.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this DNS record?

history.title: History
history.confirmRestore: Do you really want to restore this version of the zone?
history.infoDesc: You can restore a previous version of your DNS zone in case of error.

dnsServers.title: DNS Servers
dnsServers.description: DNS servers configured for this domain.
dnsServers.warning: Warning: modifying DNS servers may cause temporary unavailability of your domain during propagation (up to 48h).
dnsServers.formHint: Minimum 2 DNS servers required. IP address is optional except for Glue Records.
dnsServers.errorMinServers: You must specify at least 2 DNS servers.
dnsServers.infoDesc: DNS servers are responsible for resolving your domain name to an IP address.

dns.title: DNS Servers
dns.description: DNS servers configured for this domain.
dns.infoDesc: DNS servers are responsible for resolving your domain name to an IP address.

redirections.title: Redirections
redirections.description: Web redirections configured for this domain.
redirections.emptyHint: Create redirections to direct your visitors to other URLs.
redirections.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this redirection?
redirections.infoDesc: Permanent redirections (301) are recommended for SEO. Invisible redirections use an iframe.

redirection.title: Redirections
redirection.description: Web redirections configured for this domain.
redirection.emptyHint: Create redirections to direct your visitors to other URLs.
redirection.infoDesc: Permanent redirections (301) are recommended for SEO.

dynhost.title: DynHost
dynhost.emptyHint: Useful if your internet connection has a dynamic IP.
dynhost.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this DynHost record?
dynhost.infoDesc: DynHost allows you to automatically update the IP associated with a subdomain.
dynhost.confirmAccelerate: Do you want to accelerate this task?
dynhost.confirmCancel: Do you want to cancel this task?
dynhost.confirmDeleteLoginMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this DynHost login?
dynhost.confirmRelaunch: Do you want to relaunch this task?
dynhost.loginsHint: Logins allow updating IP via DynDNS client.

glue.title: Glue Records
glue.description: Glue records for DNS servers hosted on this domain.
glue.emptyHint: Only needed if you host your own DNS servers.
glue.ipHint: At least one IP address (v4 or v6) is required.
glue.errorIpRequired: At least one IP address is required
glue.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this Glue Record?
glue.infoDesc: Glue Records help avoid circular DNS references.

dnssec.title: DNSSEC
dnssec.enabledDesc: Your domain is protected against DNS attacks.
dnssec.disabledDesc: Enable DNSSEC to protect your domain.
dnssec.unsupportedDesc: DNSSEC is not supported for this domain.
dnssec.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this DS record?
dnssec.infoDesc: DNSSEC adds a layer of security by cryptographically signing DNS records.

tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.confirmAccelerate: Do you want to accelerate this task?
tasks.confirmCancel: Do you want to cancel this task?
tasks.confirmRelaunch: Do you want to relaunch this task?

general.confirmLock: Do you want to lock this domain against transfers?
general.confirmUnlock: Do you want to unlock this domain? It can be transferred to another registrar.

alldom.confirmTerminate: Are you sure you want to terminate this AllDom pack?

empty.title: No AllDom pack
empty.description: You have no AllDom pack associated with your account.

batch.lockDescription: Enable or disable transfer lock on multiple domains.
batch.unsupportedWarning: {{count}} domain(s) do not support this operation.
batch.dnsDescription: Modify DNS servers for multiple domains in one operation.
batch.dnsMinServers: You must specify at least 2 DNS servers.
batch.dnssecDescription: Enable or disable DNSSEC on multiple domains.
batch.renewDescription: Renew multiple domains in one operation.
